entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QUIC stream priority support #90281
  • Merged tests progress message looks broken #90277
    8.0.0
  • ConsoleMandel is not being (meaningfully) run #90276
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshalling analyzers do not warn when an element uses a stateful marshaller with MarshalMode.Default #90271
    9.0.0
  • [Android][TimeZoneInfo] GetSystemTimeZones returns timezones leading to duplicate DisplayNames API 21-25 #90269
    9.0.0
  • Vector256 assert is firing for crossgen'd SPCL #90265
    8.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller analyzers don't warn when MarshalUsing.CountElementName is set on a parameter that isn't a collection #90259
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Fragile WebSocket CI tests #90257
    8.0.0
  • [mono][docs] Change build/run individual runtime test example #90254
    Future
  • Unexpected depth mapping of Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #90252
  • [Mono] Enable more WASM AOT tests to run with WASMStripIL=true #90233
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Add the functionality to analyze the size of all compiled methods #90232
    9.0.0
  • Application crash when reaching vm.map_count limit #90230
  • LoggerMessageGenerator uses a private struct as the TState type argument to ILogger.Log #90226
    Future
  • Alternative to MALLOC_ARENA_MAX? #90224
    Future
  • JIT: Bad codegen on win-x86 #90219
    8.0.0
  • [coreclr] Native AOT runtime and functional tests on apple mobile report undefined symbols for architecture arm64 #90218
    8.0.0
  • Fail to complete json serialization when using a mix of standard serializer and custom JsonConverter #90212
  • LibraryImportAttribute incorrectly stating use of extension method and preventing compilation #90211
  • mono library eglib function offsetof error with 'src/mono/mono/eglib/glib.h' #90210
    8.0.0
  • Fix remaining Native AOT Linux DWARF errors #90209
    9.0.0
  • [wasi/wasm] dotnet workload search output has placeholder text in en-US.utf-8 locale #90207
    8.0.0

Closed

  • InlineArrayInvalid needs to be converted to il #88861
    8.0.0
  • `Loader/classloader/InlineArray/InlineArrayValid.cs` need to be updated to work with latest roslyn #88957
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'headerFunctionLength <= 0x3FFFFU' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' (IL size 712083; hash 0x46e9aa75; Tier0-MinOpts) #85063
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Possible perf improvements in casting #84464
    8.0.0
  • EnableTrimAnalyzer on netstandard2.0 projects should lead developers to success #86924
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT publishing with MSBuild doesn't work with .NET 8 SDK #89659
    8.0.0
  • Not sure, but it seems that timeBeginPeriod affects Task.Delay now? #82944
    8.0.0
  • GetTimeZoneIds empty on Android devices/emulators API 21-25 #81373
    8.0.0
  • Loading assemblies with invalid metadata keeps their file open. #83796
  • ETW need a mechanism to get an activity_id #89657
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 268 Regressions on 7/29/2023 7:04:01 PM #89940
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varDsc->IsAlwaysAliveInMemory() || ((regSet.GetMaskVars() & regMask) == 0) #75679
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in Span.IndexerBench #80445
    8.0.0
  • net6.0-ios/debugging: no listener on any ipv6 address on port 10000 but debugged app try to connect to ipv6 addresses #75877
    6.0.x
  • Incorrect codegen on Arm64 #89868
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #58699
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilitiesBenchmark #75907
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute #81145
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` fails intermittently on CI #81569
    8.0.0
  • debugger-agent not able to evaluate / resolve type with provided expression (mono) #88123
    8.0.0
  • StringValues.IsNullOrEmpty returns false when multiple null values #90240
  • [Perf] Regressions from stp/ldp in prolog on 5/3/2023 7:05:50 AM #86340
    8.0.0
  • LDAP works but after 5 minutes queries throw "The LDAP server is unavailable " #90024
    9.0.0
  • Implement AVX-512 support #77034
    8.0.0
  • Reconsider using Moq in testing #90222
  • Support equivalent of AssemblyBuilder.Save to save in-memory IL to an assembly #62956
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Zero allocation connectionless sockets #30797
    8.0.0
  • TimeSpan.Parse produces unintuitiv results #90214
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app with net6+ class libraries #87220
    7.0.x
  • AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies() and AssemblyLoadContexts being unloaded #78449
  • Error IL1012 IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error. Please report the issue at https://github.com/dotnet/linker/issues #85029
  • .net core runtime does not load two version of same assembly #81593
  • [QUIC] Test .NET 7.0 on MsQuic 2.2 #83537
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] icu build related improvements #89406
    8.0.0
  • IsolatedStorageFile GetUserStoreForApplication() returns wrong path on .NET for iOS #83384
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/NaN/intrinsic_cs_ro/intrinsic_cs_ro.dll #88451
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Profiled AOT - PGO tracking #69512
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] XCode 15 beta build failure - offset tool #87833
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Add support for library mode in the aot compiler #79377
    8.0.0
  • not support keyed services when use scoped service #90235
  • [API Proposal]: Add extensions to create an OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89263
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] ExecutionEngineException when deserializing generic [DataContract] on iOS (Realease Build, only through app store) #78889
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #89702
    8.0.0
  • Validate StartAsync() exception semantics for Starting, Start, Started #88603
    8.0.0
  • Mono HelloWorld is broken for AOT #81696
    8.0.0
  • New blazorwasm app unable to debug in browser (.net 7.0) - VSCode #78232
    7.0.x
  • [WASM][Debugger]Test timed out: DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpoint #89453
    9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Implement Mono debugger support for structs with InlineArrayAttribute #84071
    8.0.0
  • Socket.SendFile() should fail with a consistent exception for connectionless sockets #47472
    Future
  • [6.0] AppleTV CI failures: Failure to launch simulator OR failure to authenticate request #80628
  • [HttpClientFactory] ILoggerFactory dependency issue #89032
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Should QuicStream cancellation abort? #72607
    8.0.0
  • Bug .net 7 polymorphic deserialization #90213
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests long running tests #68289
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not work with required fields in records #90205
  • JSON deserialization fails in iOS release build if class implements an interface #75802
    8.0.0
  • WebToolsException when using hot reload to apply change to Blazor WebAssembly app #90037
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT DWARF info contains many overlapping ranges #83233
    8.0.0
  • Mono crashes with SEGV_ACCERR for P/Invoke in android Debug #67140
    9.0.0
  • Enable relevant thread pool events in Windows #87020
    8.0.0
  • IDynamicInterfaceCastable throws EntryPointNotFoundException when calling a generic method #88964
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixing COM Aggregation and XAML reference tracking on .NET AOT #90283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Report a diagnostic for return types with HResult-like named structures and provide a code-fix to do the correct marshalling #90282
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enabled tests failing previously on fullaot #90280
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix "Passed test" output #90279
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Restore Crossgen2's Optimizations in CoreCLR Builds #90278
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Support new Options attributes in the Runtime #90275
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Remove EnableNativeEventPipe property #90274
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Set defines for version and commit when building single-file host #90273
    area-Single-File
  • Integrate keyed DI with HttpClientFactory #90272
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Support invoke of function pointer type arg #90270
    area-System.Reflection
  • TypeLoadException thrown from MetadataLoadContext should expose TypeName #90268
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix intrinsics test failure log messages #90267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix Shuffling Thunks part 1 #90266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] make cachedResourcesPurgeDelay configurable #90264
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add implementation and test for CallerAllocatedBufferType parameters #90263
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Disallow readonly instance fields in InlineArray structs #90262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • What is the expected behavior when a reference is missing? #90261
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm][debugger] Support calling get_Item passing decimal, float or double as parameter. #90260
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix NoLinkedOuput having the wrong base attribute type. #90256
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [QUIC] WIP `QuicStream` reading/writing work #90253
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix Alpine Linux mono build #90251
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Rework JsonNamingPolicy.SnakeCase/KebabCase to precisely match Json.NET semantics. #90248
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [libs][Android] Reenable Trace_ClearTraceListeners_StopsWritingToDebugger test #90242
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [iOS] Add Macatalyst support for library mode #90237
    area-Build-mono
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Reenable properties disabled in illink.targets #90231
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix for #89645, stack overflow in Crossgen2 #90229
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Merge 7.0 fix #90228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix SocketsHttpHandler metrics test on Android #90225
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Report exception type name in Http metrics #90221
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Update runtimeFlavor property for Mono AOT perf jobs #90215
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add telemetry for mobile and wasm workloads #90208
    area-Build-mono
  • Add NonGC documentation #90206
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix up `InlineArray` tests #90192
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add `emitDispEmbBroadcastCount` to display the embedded broadcasted element count. #90123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix emitSplit to properly handle the remainder #90246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debug information to System.Diagnostics.Tracing ETW test to help track down intermittent failures #90198
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #90234
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reword diagnostic about which types can use [out], remove unused diagnostics #90188
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [JIT] ARM64 vector right-shift must dead-code eliminate if the constant is zero. #90051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionBuilder attribute to some immutable collection interfaces #89459
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix intrinsic recognition for System.Math.Tanh #90227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove spurious assertion check causing .NET Core crashes #89986
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [browser] doc node SIMD+EH, dev tools #90147
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add IgnoreForCI property to certain no-op test suites #90238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add extension methods for creating OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89973
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][Android] Fix up library mode build #90133
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • make it throw InvalidTypeLibraryException if type library is empty file #90220
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Abort host startup before the next phase #90183
    area-Extensions-Hosting, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add LLVM-AOT support to the sample app #90152
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Browser][hybrid] Fix tests for NodeJS. #90223
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Support debug inline array #90026
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Apply objc_msgsend fix to src/mono too and fix build on earlier Xcode #90217
    area-Build-mono
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Bump timeouts on Android/iOS devices jobs #90178
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90166
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix Dragon4 tutorial URL #90186
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #90190
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 7.0.x
  • Remove some unnecessary indirection to DiagnosticServerAdapter/EventPipeAdapter in nativeaot #90132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore some tests on macOS only due to small stack size #90116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix order of libraryInitializers execution #90189
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Enable support for generic methods with IDIC #90180
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add metrics configuration APIs #90201
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make getStaticFieldContent less conservative for struct with gc fields #90162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly set SizeConst = 1 and remove the warning suppression #90174
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Debugger IPC creation failure should not abort coreclr startup #90161
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #90119
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Create IL-RT folder to store roundtripped IL assemblies and sources, removed suffix '.asm' to roundtripped files, re-enabled rejit ilasm roundtripping #90110
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2240179 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Do not generate internal archives #90050
    area-Setup
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: [mono] Support function pointer reflection introspection API #89712
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Align V512 reads in IndexOf. #90177
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Use current runtime version in ILLink.Tasks package #90197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Revert "Baseline Native AOT tests (#86366)" #90184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove --flat from default dsymutil options #89358
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Initial commit for libraries directory #90203
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] bind JS methods to minified WASM imports #90145
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Remove unsafe code and make scheme parsing faster in Uri #90087
    area-System.Net
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Lsra JitStressRegs mode SpillAlways fixes #89720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89863
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [iOS] Disable failing CI tests #90181
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • PoC: enable AIA tests on Mariner #90199
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #89502
    area-Build-mono
  • Using stackalloc instead of new byte[x] on Streams #88303
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: use corresponding default message for all overloads #89846
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add a workaround for android apps, in order to leverage the feature of trimming compiled methods #90106
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improvements to Banned APIs #90165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90200
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enable isolates storage tests on maccatalyst #90150
    area-System.IO, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsics on amd64 #89997
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Switch DateTimeKind from Unspecified to Local #90149
    area-System.Management, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Incremental build improvements #90194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `la.local` between the JIT_PatchedCodeStart #90143
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
